Package taskawaii.control

Class Task

java.lang.Object
taskawaii.control.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Task extends Object implements Serializable
This is the most basic unit class of Tasks.

    • isDue

      public boolean isDue()
      This will check if the task is already due based on LocalDateTime.now().
      Returns:
      It will return true if the task is already due. It will return false otherwise.

    • markCompleted

      This will mark the task as complete.

      This will mark the task as incomplete.

      public boolean isComplete()
      This checks if the task has been marked as complete.
      Returns:
      It will return the boolean value of the completed variable.
